azure_storage_container.description: The advanced section of all the azure storage container module

az_storage_account_name.description: The name of the storage account which you want this container to be added

az_storage_account_id.description: The id of the storage account which you want this container to be added

access_type.description: The Access Level configured for this Container. Possible values are blob, container or private. Defaults to private

lifecycles.description: The lifecycle map that you can give to the container blobs

^[a-zA-Z0-9_.-]*$.description: This can be a random name to specify a lifecycle rule

prefix_match.description: An array of strings for prefixes to be matched.

tier_to_cool_after_days.description: The age in days after last modification to tier blobs to cool storage. Supports blob currently at Hot tier. Must be between 0 and 99999. Defaults to -1

tier_to_archive_after_days.description: The age in days after last modification to tier blobs to archive storage. Supports blob currently at Hot or Cool tier. Must be between 0 and 99999. Defaults to -1

delete_after_days.description: The age in days after last modification to delete the blob. Must be between 0 and 99999. Defaults to -1

snapshot_delete_after_days.description: The age in days after creation to delete the blob snapshot. Must be between 0 and 99999. Defaults to -1

attributes.description: The output attributes for azure storage container module

storage_account_name.description: The storage account name where the containers are created

storage_account_id.description: The storage account id where the containers are created

primary_access_key.description: The primary access key for the storage account

container_name.description: The name of the container that is created and will be referenced by other applications
